name: MEC Revy Gloves - Unisex
description:
Warm ski gloves ready for Revy, Whistler or wherever else the snow leads. Ready for shredding with pre-curved fingers to grip ski poles, and cords for fast adjustments and no dropped gloves.Recycled polyester with a waterproof-breathable membrane.Fast drying Tricot lining wicks moisture.Polyester insulation is 360g on backs, 200g on palms.Leather-like palm material won't soak through.Removable keeper cords.Hook-and-loop cuff tabs for fast adjustments.

        Sustainability
